participant_1.background:
I've never told my parents that I'm not a morning person.
i make pottery.
i take fridays off in the summer.
i like to go out to eat.
I am from the Midwest, where we love our sweet treats and hip hop.

participant_2.background:
I like going to Halloween parties because I can dress up and be someone else.
i never learned how to drive.
I listen to jazz and reminisce about my time in Paris.
Baking is my passion, and I have a soft spot for dogs.
I finally got up the courage to try a new exercise class and really enjoyed it!

content.text: Hi, do you like the midwest? I am from there.
Hi, I have not been to the Midwest, but I have heard great things about it.
It is a great place to be. The people are friendly and there is a lot to do.
What is your favorite thing to do in the Midwest?
I love to go out to eat and try all the different restaurants. There are a lot of great restaurants in the Midwest.
I love to cook and bake. I am a bit of a foodie.
Me too! I love to bake and try new recipes. I make pottery as a hobby.
That's cool! I have never tried pottery. I do listen to jazz and reminisce about my time in Paris.
I have never been to Paris, but I would love to go. I love to listen to jazz too.
It's a beautiful city. I would love to go back.
I have a soft spot for dogs too. I have a dog of my own.
That's great! I love dogs too. I have a dog of my own.
It's great to meet someone who has similar interests.
Yes, it is. We should talk again soon.
